The course was well organized to facilitate student learning

Comments_List: Understanding of how structure and function are integrated. Understanding of histology and all body systems.
Deeper understanding of histology and recognizing features of histology images
I learned a lot about histology and systems bio in general.

The guest instructors were great!

It could be improved by having homework assignments that can actually addressed by the lectures and not only through outside information

It was great to get an overview of all systems in the body. Histology could be integrated into a few of the lectures. Some homework assignments could have involved more critical thinking and less textbook knowledge. In person histology slides or samples would have made the histology labs more engaging.

The online laboratory portion is very informative- I would actually prefer to have more images for each module and increased labeling within each image to better understand the image as a whole. 
Quizzes and assignments were very fair in my opinion. 

The lecture portion of this class is not very cohesive. Engagement with lecture material is somewhat low because some lectures have overlapping content, which is a product of having so many independent lecturers. The fact that lectures are never tested on also hinders willingness to engage with lecture material.
I wouldve liked an even larger focus on histology but overall I thought this course was very informative and interesting.
Yes! It was a fun course. I learned a lot.
For the purpose of learning histology and having a relatively low workload, yes.
I would only recommend it to somebody who really wanted to learn about histology. The lectures in the class did not seem to extend much beyond what we learned in Physiological Systems.
Yes, I thought it was an excellent course.
Yes. Learned a lot about anatomy. Lecturers are amazing.
